spouseRoom_Robin: Hey honey, good morning.#$e#Let me know if there's anything that need to be fixed.
Rainy_Day_0: It's raining. Not the most pleasant weather for a carpenter.$2#$e#Well, at least is good for the farm.
Rainy_Day_1: I checked the buildings just in case. Doesn't seem to be any leaks.
Rainy_Day_2: Good morning @! I woke up early from the sound of the rain and made you some breakfast. [194 195 210 211 216]  #$e#Stay warm and don't work too hard. I want you to stay healthy.
Rainy_Day_3: I hope the road to my old house doesn't get too muddy.$2
Rainy_Night_0: The rain makes it feel like we're all alone.$6#$e#I'm cold... Aren't you ready to tuck into bed?$6
Rainy_Night_1: Make sure you change into something warm. I don't want you to get sick.#$e#Can you hear the rain pattering on the roof, @?
Rainy_Night_2: Ah...The soothing sound of rain overhead... I'm going to sleep well tonight.
Rainy_Night_3: Working with wood can be so relaxing.$u#$e#I should try teaching you some time, maybe you'll like it.
Rainy_Night_4: Hey @, glad you're home... I missed you.$7#$b#.
Indoor_Day_0: Good morning @#$e#Ready for a hard day's work? I am.
Indoor_Day_1: Make sure to eat plenty, you'll need energy for the day. I know how tiring manual work can be.
Indoor_Day_2: Did you sleep well honey?.#$b#Me? Of course.
Indoor_Day_3: Hey, someone must've gotten a good night of sleep... No wonder after yesterday's night.$7
Indoor_Day_4: Good morning, honey. Another day of farm chores, huh?
Indoor_Night_1: Wow, you look tired today honey.#$b#I hope you still have some energy for later.$7
Indoor_Night_2: You look like you've been working hard @. Let me help you de-stress.$7
Indoor_Night_3: Are you done with your work for the day? I'm ready to have some fun.$7
Indoor_Night_4: *phew*! I just finished my work for today. Now we can spend some time together.#$e#So, tell me about your day.
Introduction: Have you met everyone in town yet? That sounds exhausting.
Resort: Wow, look at these structures!$h#$b#I can tell they were made by a master builder. I'm really impressed!
Resort_Shore: Hey, look! I can see another island from here.
Resort_Chair: Hey @. You know, I was just thinking about how far the town has come since you first moved here.#$b#As you wife, I must say that I'm proud of you.
reject_865: Veggie salt? Sounds good, but I don't need it.
reject_866: Hmm... when I think of flowers, I think of Evelyn. Maybe show this to her?
pamHouseUpgrade: Our little plan worked out well, don't you think? Pam and Penny seem really happy.
pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: Our little plan worked out well, don't you think? Pam and Penny seem really happy.
MovieInvitation: Ooh... Two tickets for tonight's show, huh? Sounds good! I'll meet you there.$h
cc_Bridge: Hey! I heard some weird noises last night, and woke up this morning to find the quarry bridge completely repaired!#$b#It's a miracle of woodworking!
cc_Complete: I knew it from the moment you stepped off that bus, @... you were destined to be a town hero!$h
cc_Begin: Hey! I heard that Lewis showed you around the Community Center... It'd be great if you could fix that place up. It used to be a really nice building!
Mon: Have I told you that I built my old house from the ground up?#$e#It's definitely been the highlight of my career so far.
Tue: I wonder what I should do with the laboratory at my house. Maybe I can renovate it.
Wed: Hey there, @.#$e#I was just daydreaming about some new carpentry projects.
Thu: It can get pretty lonely up here in the mountains. Visit me as much as you want honey.
Fri: You've met my son Sebastian, right? He lives downstairs.#$e#He's a little shy, but I'm sure he'll warm up to you if you're nice to him.
Fri_inlaw_Sebastian: I miss my Sebby... he was always a little misunderstood, but I believed in him.
Fri4: #$1 RobinSeb#I found an ashtray in Sebastian's room, and it smelled really weird. Should I be worried about this?#$e#Sometimes I worry about Sebastian... he doesn't have many friends and doesn't really seem to care about his future very much...#$e#I would talk to him about it but he never opens up to me.
Fri4_inlaw_Sebastian: Sebastian told me he's trying to quit smoking! I'm really proud of him.
Sat: Both our houses are in beautiful areas, we're so lucky.
Sun: I'm not even sure what Maru's working on. I think it has something to do with black holes.
Sun2: Hi honey! It's good to see you.
Sun6: Hi honey! It's good to see you.
event_wood1: Great, then this blueprint should be a piece of cake for you!$h
event_wood2: Well, then I have the perfect blueprint to get you started!
summer_Mon: Wood is a wonderful substance... it's versatile, cheap, strong, and each piece has it's own unique character!
summer_Tue: If you need any buildings on your farm upgraded, just ask me!#$e#You'll need to provide enough lumber and stone for the project. And it costs money, too.#$e#Yeah, I now you're my husband, but you're my best client too. I don't want to lose my income.$1
summer_Fri: We're pretty insulated from the rest of the world here in Stardew Valley.#$e#It has its pros and cons.
fall_Mon: #$1 RobinMaru#Maru likes gems. She uses them in her inventions.#$e#So how are you and Maru getting along?
fall_Thu: It can get pretty lonely up here in the mountains. Visit me as much as you want honey.
fall_Fri: Have you met the wild man that lives behind my house?$s#$e#I guess I don't really mind, as long as he doesn't bother us.
winter_Mon: Hey, it's a perfect time of year to gather wood. Tell me if you need help.
winter_Fri: My parents were bewildered when I told them I wanted to be a carpenter.#$e#They were pretty old-fashioned.
winter_Fri_inlaw_Sebastian: I think the farm life is really healthy for Sebby.
winter_Sat: Everything looks still after a fresh snow. It's so beautiful
